thread.title: Kevin McCarthy Suggests House Republicans Are Ungovernable

author: LongWinded
title: Kevin McCarthy Suggests House Republicans Are Ungovernable
text: Kevin McCarthy Suggests House Republicans Are Ungovernable User Name Current Events Current Events Forum - Latest political news and events 6 Thanks Kevin McCarthy Suggests House Republicans Are Ungovernable, May Need To ?Hit Rock Bottom? | ThinkProgress Quote: In the wake of Rep. Kevin McCarthy withdrawing his candidacy to replace Speaker John Boehner (R-OH), the California Republican speculated that the House could be ungovernable. In a phone interview with the National Reviews Rich Lowry, McCarthy said that he would not have enjoyed being speaker this way and speculated the House may need to hit rock bottom before it can become governable. God love this guy. He's just a regular truth teller on his own party, isn't he? Talent on loan from god Location: Ohio Posts: 17,910 Thanks from LongWinded and Lyzza Camelot Camelot and Lyzza LongWinded Camelot has to resort to Executive Orders. We have a highway funding crisis in October, a debt ceiling crisis coming in November and a budget crisis in December and these Republican fools are too busy cannibalizing each other and to choose someone to lead them.
